lead_paragraph: Francis and Hassan Rouhani stressed “the importance of interreligious dialogue” to achieve solutions to the conflicts in the Middle East.

byline.contributor: Thomas Erdbrink contributed reporting from Tehran.

snippet: Francis and Hassan Rouhani stressed “the importance of interreligious dialogue” to achieve solutions to the conflicts in the Middle East.

headline.main: Pope Francis and Hassan Rouhani of Iran Discuss Mideast Unrest
headline.print_headline: At Vatican, Pope and Iran’s President Discuss Mideast Unrest

abstract: Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani meets with Pope Francis at Vatican to discuss involvement of religious communities in creating peace in Middle East; encounter is part of Rouhani's four-day visit to Italy and France following lifting of sanctions.
